title: UCI Continues Its War on Long Socks: Sanctions Increased for ‘Non-Compliant Clothing’
content:
Penalties for breaching 'sock height rule', drafting, and receiving sticky bottles all part of review applicable to 2024 pro season.

Read the full article at UCI Continues Its War on Long Socks: Sanctions Increased for ‘Non-Compliant Clothing’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
